pair.description:
Below you find a list with BEEP bases that were found. Click on a BEEP base to connect to it and have it play a sound.

When you are certain you have selected the correct device, press Next.
pair.subtitle: Firmware: v{{firmware}}  Hardware: v{{hardware}}

state.hardwareId: Retrieving hardware ID of BEEP base...
state.registered: This BEEP base is successfully registered to your account.
state.failed: Could not register this BEEP base.
state.deviceAlreadyLinkedToAnotherAccount:
This BEEP base is already registered to another account.

Ask the person you acquired your BEEP base from to transfer it to you.

home.introduction: Below you find a list of BEEP bases that are currently associated with your account.

peripheralDetail.instructions: Wake up your BEEP base by pressing the button shortly (v3.3 and newer) or by holding the magnet next to the microphone plug (older versions). Then press the Connect above to read out the device details and change several settings. Settings can also be changed using ‘Configure new BEEP base’.

firmware.newerAvailableDescription: There is a newer version available
firmware.ENABLING_DFU_MODE: Initializing BEEP base for firmware upload
